data.lyric:
[ti:Thunderclouds]

[00:00.01]Thunderclouds - LSD/Sia (希雅)/Diplo (迪波洛)/Labrinth (迷走小子)
[00:00.02]Lyrics by：Thomas Pentz, Jr./Timothy McKenzie/Sia Furler/Henry Agincourt Allen/Philip Meckseper
[00:00.03]Composed by：Thomas Pentz, Jr./Timothy McKenzie/Sia Furler/Henry Agincourt Allen/Philip Meckseper
[00:00.02]Sia：
[00:00.45]All I need is one
[00:04.99]One old man is enough
[00:09.21]Babe you got it wrong
[00:13.32]Please turn your fears into trust to trust
[00:18.76]Sia/Labrinth：
[00:19.11]Where'd the love go
[00:21.57]When all is said and done
[00:24.03]Hey now I got your hands in the air
[00:26.25]I'ma go through your stuff
[00:27.54]Where'd the love go
[00:29.53]You put the running into run
[00:32.79]You asking me to stay
[00:34.52]But I never met a girl I could trust
[00:35.95]Labrinth/Sia：
[00:36.58]You're sayin' those words like you hate me now
[00:44.04]Wo wo oah
[00:45.28]Our house is burning when you're raised in hell
[00:52.62]Wo wo oah
[00:53.87]Here in the ashes your soul cries out
[01:00.69]A a ah
[01:02.41]Don't be afraid of these thunderclouds
[01:10.41]These thunderclouds oh no
[01:14.55]These thunderclouds oh no no
[01:18.00]Labrinth：
[01:18.16]All I need is love
[01:22.16]All I need is a word
[01:26.38]All I need is us
[01:30.68]You turned nouns into verbs to verbs
[01:35.69]Labrinth/Sia：
[01:36.19]Where'd the love go
[01:38.71]When all is said and done
[01:41.51]Hey now put your hands in the air
[01:43.31]I'mma go through your stuff
[01:44.84]Where'd the love go
[01:46.63]You put the running into run
[01:49.84]You're asking me to stay
[01:51.54]But I never met a man I could trust
[01:53.16]Babe
[01:53.33]Sia/Both：
[01:53.62]You're sayin' those words like you hate me now
[02:02.49]Our house is burning when you're raising hell
[02:11.04]Here in the ashes your soul cries out
[02:19.49]But don't be afraid of these thunderclouds
[02:27.49]These thunderclouds oh no
[02:31.73]These thunderclouds oh no no
[02:35.99]These thunderclouds oh no
[02:40.28]These thunderclouds oh no no
